establishConnection

public boolean establishConnection(String server,
                                   String username,
                                   String password)
                            throws org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPException
Establishes a connection and authenticates the user

Parameters:
server - The name of the xmpp server
username - The user name
password - The password of the user
Returns:
True if the connection could be established and the login was successful

                              throws PresenceTypeAdapter.UnknownPresenceException
Retrieve information about the nodes of the epic network

Returns:
